posts.name: Big Apple Inn
posts.note: The Big Apple Inn is an institution of old-school Southern sandwiches from Jackson, MS, which have 'smokes' (sausage), 'ears' (pig ears), and tamales along with a whole lot of history and hospitality. The sausage sandiwch and hte pig sandwich were great one of the best things I ate in my 13 day tour of the south.

posts.name: Doe's Eat Place
posts.note: They make all beef tamales from Doe's original recipe. Made the same way since 1941, they are a true taste of the Mississippi Delta.
